name: Tidus
abilities: When Tidus enters the field, if you control 8 or more Forwards and/or Backups, you may pay {a}{a}{a}. When you do so, select up to 3 of the 3 following actions. "Choose 1 Forward. Put it at the bottom of its owner's deck." "Choose 1 Backup. Put it on top of its owner's deck." "Choose 1 Backup. Put it on top of its owner's deck." "Draw 2 cards."
